attributes.action: Chemtrails Poisoning us all:  Make it illegal to switch off aircraft transponders when spraying above the clouds out of sight of an innocent public.
attributes.additional_details: Mounting suicidal toxic nanoparticulate  aluminium polluting Earth making all life extinct suits aliens but not us. Tell the truth about US (and UK?) govt employing other other beings - as exposed by Phil Schneider before he was murdered as he predicted he would be for revealing Area 51 secrets 2 miles deep.

rejection.details: There are several petitions from the creator on this subject.
